00028 MD_Vector_base2::MD_Vector_base2()
00029 {
00030   nb_items_tot_ = -1;
00031   nb_items_reels_ = -1;
00032   nb_items_seq_tot_ = -1;
00033   nb_items_seq_local_ = -1;

00036 //
00037 //! method used to dump/restore a descriptor in a file<br>Each process writes a different descriptor. See MD_Vector_tools::restore_vector_with_md()
00038 Entree& MD_Vector_base2::readOn(Entree& is)
00039 {
00040   Param p("MD_Vector_base2");
00041   p.ajouter("nb_items_tot", &nb_items_tot_);
00042   p.ajouter("nb_items_reels", &nb_items_reels_);
00043   p.ajouter("nb_items_seq_tot", &nb_items_seq_tot_);
00044   p.ajouter("nb_items_seq_local", &nb_items_seq_local_);
00045   p.ajouter("blocs_items_to_sum", &blocs_items_to_sum_);
00046   p.ajouter("blocs_items_to_compute", &blocs_items_to_compute_);
00047   p.lire_avec_accolades(is);
00048   return is;
00049 }
00050 
00051 //
00052 //! method used to dump/restore a descriptor in a file<br>Each process writes a different descriptor. See MD_Vector_tools::dump_vector_with_md()
00053 Sortie& MD_Vector_base2::printOn(Sortie& os) const
00054 {
00055   os << "{" << finl;
00056   os << "nb_items_tot" << space << nb_items_tot_ << finl;
00057   os << "nb_items_reels" << space << nb_items_reels_ << finl;
00058   os << "nb_items_seq_tot" << space << nb_items_seq_tot_ << finl;
00059   os << "nb_items_seq_local" << space << nb_items_seq_local_ << finl;
00060   os << "blocs_items_to_sum" << space << blocs_items_to_sum_;
00061   os << "blocs_items_to_compute" << space << blocs_items_to_compute_;
00062   os << "}" << finl;
00063   return os;
00064 }
